contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.test.status
contextValues.value:
CASE WHEN isEmpty(lookup("test_lower")) THEN null	
WHEN KPIValue("test") <= lookup("test_lower") THEN - 1	
ELSE 1 END

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.Smoothed PnL.description
contextValues.value: PnL monitoring with a smoothing period of 15s

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.Tunnel Count Monitoring.status
contextValues.value: Case	When IsEmpty(lookup("lower_goal")) OR IsEmpty(lookup("upper_goal"))	Then NULL	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("lower_goal") - 0.1 * ABS(lookup("lower_goal"))	Then -1	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("lower_goal")	Then 0	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("upper_goal")	Then 1	When [Measures].[contributors.COUNT] < lookup("upper_goal") + 0.04 * ABS(lookup("upper_goal"))	Then 0	Else -1	End

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.Data contribution.status
contextValues.value: Case	When IsEmpty([Measures].[Data contribution Value]) OR IsEmpty([Measures].[Data contribution Goal])		Then NULL	When [Measures].[Data contribution Value] >= [Measures].[Data contribution Goal] * (1 + lookup("warning_threshold", 0.05))		Then -1	When [Measures].[Data contribution Value] > [Measures].[Data contribution Goal]		Then 0	Else 1	End

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.PnL Monitoring (MDX).trend
contextValues.value: Case		When [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.level.ordinal = 0			Then Case			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.firstChild.nextMember) > 0				Then 1			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.firstChild.nextMember) = 0				Then 0			Else -1			End		Else			Case			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.nextMember) > 0				Then 1			When KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)") - (KpiValue("PnL Monitoring (MDX)"), [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.nextMember) = 0				Then 0			Else -1			End		End

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.kpie.status

WHEN KPIValue("kpie") <= lookup("kpie_lower") THEN - 1	
ELSE 1 END

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.PnL Monitoring (LookUp).status
contextValues.value:
Case When IsEmpty([Measures].[PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Goal]) Then NULL // No goal => no status 
 When [Measures].[pnl.SUM] > [Measures].[PnL Monitoring (LookUp) Goal] Then 1 Else -1 End

contextValues.name: mdx.kpi.Pnl Sensitivity.status
contextValues.value: Case	When [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Value] > [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Goal]		Then 1	When [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Value] > 0.90 * [Measures].[Pnl Sensitivity Goal]		Then 0	Else -1	End

measures.caption: Smoothed PnL Start
measures.expression:
CASE
  WHEN CoalesceEmpty([Measures].[PnL Limit Status], 1) > -0.5 THEN NULL
  WHEN [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status] > -0.5 THEN
    CDate(
      TopCount(PastPeriods([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember, 15, 's'), 1, CLng(
        IIF(
          CoalesceEmpty([Measures].[PnL Limit Status], 1) <= -0.5 
          AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) > -0.5,
          [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.MemberValue,
          NULL
        )
      )).Item(0).MemberValue
    )
  WHEN [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.level.ordinal = 0 THEN
    IIF(
      NOT [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild IS [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.LastChild
      AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status]), 1) > -0.5,
      IIF(
        CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) <= -0.5,
        ([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Start]),
        CDATE([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.FirstChild.MemberValue)
      ),
      NULL
    )
  ELSE
    IIF(
      NOT [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember IS [Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.Parent.LastChild
      AND CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Status]), 1) > -0.5,
      IIF(
        CoalesceEmpty(([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[PnL Limit Status]), 1) <= -0.5,
        ([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.NextMember, [Measures].[Smoothed PnL Start]),
        CDATE([Epoch].[Epoch].CurrentMember.MemberValue)),
      NULL
    )
END
measures.name: Smoothed PnL Start
